questions.title: Is this app really safe?
questions.body: There are tons of apps that promise to keep my files safe, why should i chose MyOlder?

answer.title: Yes, it's safe
answer.body: MyOlder uses lots of advanced features for keeping your files safe.

questions.title: How many safe files can i add?
questions.body: Is there a limit to the safe files that i can add to the safe zone?

answer.title: No, there isn't
answer.body: MyOlder is meant to allow an infinite number of safe files into the safe zone. It doesn't cost nothing for you.

answer.title: Gabriele Cavallo
answer.body: Gabriele Cavallo Created this application, with love and time.
